mapper.insert: insert into SpecialtyPlanDetail(specialtyPlanId, subjectId, referenceHours, sortParament) values (#{specialtyPlanId}, #{subjectId}, #{referenceHours}, #{sortParament})
mapper.select: select id, specialtyPlanId, subjectId, referenceHours, sortParament from SpecialtyPlanDetail where specialtyPlanId = #{specialtyPlanId}
